page.title: 05Fire.Police and Ambulance
page.content: Presteigne has its own{part time } fire brigade,two policemen and an ambulance. The Presteigne fire brigade are all{volunteers,}who all have a full time job locally.They know when there is a fire because they all carry {'personal alerters'}and when these sound they have to get to the fire station as quickly as possible.Before they were issued with alerters there was a bell tower at the station and they were summoned by the{bell {ringing. There are ten firemen and two fire appliances.They are called out to about{60 fires a year,}on average about one a week.They also do other jobs such as attending road traffic accidents,pumping out floods and rescuing people.
